user_id.title: show user_id, content of this field is:

params.name: to_del_attrs
params.description: list of attributes to be deleted

isp_names.title: list of isp names, or string of one isp name

group_name.title: list of group names, or string of one group name

not_in_group_name.title: list of group names, or string of one group name

methods.name: user.searchExpiredUsersExtended
methods.description: larger output than searchExpiredUsers, returns expiration dates too

methods.name: user.saveSearchExpiredUsers
methods.description: use SystemNotification.getNotifications() method to see if the report is finished and get the URL to download it

params.name: conds
params.description: the same as searchExpiredUsers, at least one condition is necessary

allow_recharge_by_voucher.title: true if exists, User Info Flags Allow Recharge By Voucher

assign_dns.title: User Info Internet Assign DNS To User

charge.title: list of charge names, or string of one charge name

custom_field_test_integer.title: sample cutom field with name 'test_integer' and type 'Integer'

custom_field_test_string.title: sample cutom field with name 'test_string' and type 'String'

group_name.title: list of group names or string of one group name

ippool.title: list of ippool names, or string of one ippool name

is_online.title: show online user if set to true, show offline user if set to false

online_status.title: show idle, failed and active users if you set to idle, failed or online

isp_names.title: list of isp names, or string of one isp name

isp_id.title: array or int, list of ISP IDs, or integer of one ISP ID

limit_usage_days.title: array or int, integer (number of days), or list of integers (number of days)

lock.title: true if exists, user is locked

no_lock.title: true if exists, user is not locked

activation_required.title: true if exists, User Info Message Center MC Activation Required

mikrotik_address_list.title: list of many string (to match according to given operator), or just a string

never_expire_users.title: true if exists, users without any kind of expiration date (will never expire)

never_logged_in_users.title: true if exists, users that have never logged in

no_normal_username.title: true if exists, user has no internet username

notification_profile.title: array or string, list of notification profile names. or string of one profile name

online_payment.title: true if exists, user has online payment (enabled in User Info Online Payment Online Payment)

renew_next_group.title: list of group names, or string of group name

user_status.title: pass '0' for Package, '0,1' for Package and Recharged, '0,2' for Package and Temporary Extended

params.name: del_connection_logs
params.description: pass true if you want users' connection logs to be deleted too

params.name: del_audit_logs
params.description: pass true if you want users' audit logs to be deleted too

methods.name: user.killUser
methods.description: requires KILL USER permission if kill=true, and CLEAR USER permission is kill=false

params.description: Unique ID Value (for exmaple Port, Caller ID, etc)

params.name: kill
params.description: true means Kill User, false means Clear User

methods.name: user.killUserByID
methods.description: by admin, disconnects all instances of given users

params.name: kill
params.description: true means Kill User, false means Clear User

methods.name: user.killUserByID
methods.description: by user, disconnects all instances of user himself

methods.name: user.killMe
methods.description: by user, disconnects selected instance

params.description: Unique ID Value (for exmaple Port, Caller ID, etc)

id.title: return null if enter correct parameters

result.title: return true if enter correct parameters

error.title: return null if enter correct parameters

methods.name: user.saveSearchUser
methods.description: use SystemNotification.getNotifications() method to see if the report is finished and get the URL to download it

methods.name: user.getBulkActionsForAdmin
methods.description: get list of performed or running Bulk Actions, which admin has access to see them

methods.name: user.viewBulkActionStatus
methods.description: get status of a Bulk Action (that has been started by the admin himself)

formated_start_date.title: start datetime string, depending on input date_type

formated_end_date.title: end datetime string, depending on input date_type

canceled.title: true if the action is canceled

failed.title: true if the action is failed

methods.name: user.cancelBulkAction
methods.description: cancel a Bulk Action (that has been started by the admin himself)

methods.name: user.clearBulkAction
methods.description: clear (remove from list) a Bulk Action (that has been started by the admin himself), and is finished

methods.description: combines methods 'user.searchUser' and 'user.updateUserAttrs'

methods.description: combines methods 'user.searchUser' and 'user.renewUsers'
